verses.verse: Every <S%H2454>wise<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1129>builds<s%> her <S%H1004>house<s%>: but the <S%H200>foolish<s%> plucks it <S%H2040>down<s%> with her <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
He that <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but he that is <S%H3868>perverse<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%> despises <S%H959>him<s%>.
In the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H191>foolish<s%> is a <S%H2415>rod<s%> of <S%H1346>pride<s%>: but the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> shall preserve <S%H8104>them<s%>.
Where no <S%H504>oxen<s%> <S%H18>are<s%>, the crib is <S%H1249>clean<s%>: but <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H8393>increase<s%> is by the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox<s%>.
A <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will not <S%H3577>lie<s%>: but a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will <S%H6315>utter<s%> <S%H3576>lies<s%>.
A <S%H3887>scorner<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and finds it <S%H1847>not<s%>: but knowledge is <S%H7043>easy<s%> unto him that <S%H995>understands<s%>.
<S%H3212>Go<s%> from the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, when you <S%H3045>perceive<s%> not in him the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
The <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> is to <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>: but the <S%H200>wickedness<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
<S%H191>Fools<s%> make a <S%H3887>mock<s%> at <S%H817>sin<s%>: but among the <S%H3477>righteous<s%> there is <S%H7522>favor<s%>.
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> his <S%H5315>own<s%> <S%H4787>bitterness<s%>; and a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> does not <S%H6148>share<s%> with his <S%H8057>joy<s%>.
The <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H8045>overthrown<s%>: but the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> which seems <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, but the <S%H319>end<s%> there are the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
Even in <S%H7814>laughter<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3510>sorrowful<s%>; and the <S%H319>end<s%> of that <S%H8057>mirth<s%> is <S%H8424>heaviness<s%>.
The <S%H5472>backslider<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with his own <S%H1870>ways<s%>: and a <S%H2896>good<s%> man shall be satisfied from <S%H376>himself<s%>.
The <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H539>believes<s%> every <S%H1697>word<s%>: but the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man looks <S%H995>wisely<s%> to his <S%H838>ways<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H3373>fears<s%>, and <S%H5493>departs<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>: but the <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H5674>rages<s%>, and is <S%H982>confident<s%>.
He that is <S%H7116>soon<s%> <S%H639>angry<s%> <S%H6213>deals<s%> <S%H200>foolishly<s%>: and a <S%H376>man<s%> of wicked <S%H4209>devices<s%> is <S%H8130>hated<s%>.
The <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H200>wickedness<s%>: but the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> are <S%H3803>crowned<s%> with <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
The <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7817>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%>; and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> is <S%H8130>hated<s%> even of his own <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: but the <S%H6223>rich<s%> has <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H157>friends<s%>.
He that <S%H936>despises<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%>: but he that has <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on the <S%H6035>poor<s%>, happy is <S%H835>he<s%>.
Do they not <S%H8582>err<s%> that <S%H2790>devise<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>? but <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be to them that <S%H2790>devise<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.
In all <S%H6089>labor<s%> there is <S%H4195>profit<s%>: but the <S%H1697>talk<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> tends only to <S%H4270>poverty<s%>.
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is their <S%H6239>riches<s%>: but the <S%H200>foolishness<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is <S%H200>wickedness<s%>.
A <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H5337>delivers<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>: but a <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> witness <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>.
In the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4009>confidence<s%>: and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall have a place of <S%H4268>refuge<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.

In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1927>honor<s%>: but in the <S%H657>want<s%> of <S%H3816>people<s%> is the <S%H4288>destruction<s%> of the <S%H7333>prince<s%>.

He that is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>wrath<s%> is of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%>: but he that is <S%H7116>hasty<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7311>exalts<s%> <S%H200>wickedness<s%>.
A <S%H4832>sound<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is the <S%H2416>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: but <S%H7068>envy<s%> the <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> of the <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
He that <S%H6231>oppresses<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H2778>blasphemes<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%>: but he that <S%H3513>honors<s%> him has <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on the <S%H34>poor<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is driven <S%H1760>away<s%> in his <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> has <S%H2620>hope<s%> in his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> <S%H5117>rests<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of him that has <S%H995>understanding<s%>: but that which is in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is made <S%H3045>known<s%>.
<S%H6666>Righteousness<s%> <S%H7311>exalts<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%>: but <S%H2403>sin<s%> is a <S%H2617>reproach<s%> to any <S%H3816>people<s%>.
The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7522>favor<s%> is toward a <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%>: but his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> is against him that causes <S%H954>shame<s%>.
